data.message: Hey, you guys what are you going to do about the lady in Georgia you kicked off facebook because you didn't like her name? Said it was phony. He who critizes names should be ashame and look at the names of some of his employees. Better yet look at the name of some of the people who as responded to your NY colorless photo. What about the person who took your picture, that's a unique name isn't it? Just an observation.
